definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Traditionally vinified, this wine matured for 6 months in French oak barrels .
sentences.chinese: 传统工艺酿制，在法国产的橡木桶存放6个月。

sentences.english: Spices, red berries and delicate oak aromas.
sentences.chinese: 散发着辛香，红浆果和精致的橡木气息。

sentences.english: It’s like four feet tall with two swinging doors, solid oak.
sentences.chinese: 那个柜子大概足有4尺高，带两扇合页门，纯橡木的。

sentences.english: A large table stood in the center of the room, several maps spread across its oaken surface.
sentences.chinese: 屋子中央是一张大橡木桌子，上面摊着几张地图。

sentences.english: All with their eyes intently fastened on the iron-clamped oaken door.
sentences.chinese: 他们一个个都紧盯着布满铁钉的橡木牢门。

sentences.english: Smooth tannins texture combined with blackcurrant, plum, dried date and oak.
sentences.chinese: 丹宁柔和，充满黑醋栗，李子，干枣和橡木味道。

sentences.english: Because of its naturally lower levels of tannins, it is considered to be an excellent wine for oak treatment.
sentences.chinese: 由于其单宁酸含量低，最好用橡木来储存。

sentences.english: This wine is bold and rich, featuring mouth-filling flavours of peachy fruit sweetness, intermingling with toasty vanillin oak.
sentences.chinese: 大胆，丰富，甜甜的桃子带着香草橡木味充满了味蕾。

sentences.english: This wine is fruity; perd has elegould like oakbouquets.
sentences.chinese: 这款酒果香丰郁，并且有文雅的橡木味。

sentences.english: Beautifully balanced with red fruit and plum flavors followed by a wood sensation.
sentences.chinese: 红果与李子的口味在橡木味道衬托下颇为平衡。

sentences.english: He watched as the brothers completed their entrance and positioned themselves before polished oak pews.
sentences.chinese: 他看着武士们全部进场安坐在擦亮的橡木长凳上。

sentences.english: The oak barrels give the whisky its caramel colour.
sentences.chinese: 橡木桶使威士忌的颜色变成焦糖色。

sentences.english: The reserve cabernet sauvignon has been aged in French and American oak for 17 months.
sentences.chinese: 这款赤霞珠已在法国和美国橡木桶中陈放了17个月。

sentences.english: It was built using oak and the exterior is clad in burnt larch wood.
sentences.chinese: 这是采用橡木和外部是穿着烧毁落叶松木材。

sentences.english: Persistent blackberries fruits and toasty oak in lingering finish.
sentences.chinese: 持续的黑梅子和烤橡木味令余韵更为悠长。

sentences.english: We will floor this room with oak.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算用橡木铺地板。

definition: pomelo tree (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
